# close()

**Instance Method**

Forces the popover to close without consulting its delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func close()
```

## Discussion

Any popovers nested within the popovers will also receive a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/close()] message. When a window is closed in response to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/close()] message being sent, all of its popovers are closed. The popover animates out when closed unless the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/animates] property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Closing a Popover

- **performClose(_:)**: Attempts to close the popover.
